https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ftGJaH8U59kq0eexRNBGp37IKLB.jpg The games of the 28th summer olympiad returned to the birthplace of the Olympics - Athens, Greece. The games ran from August 13 to 29th 2004. Athens 2004: Olympic Closing Ceremony (Games of the XXVIII Olympiad)
